title: Solana
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: solana-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0566
	- preferred-term:: Solana
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A high-performance blockchain platform combining Proof-of-History (PoH) with Proof-of-Stake consensus, enabling parallel transaction processing for exceptional throughput exceeding 65,000 TPS. Uses single-layer architecture where all transactions process on the base layer, prioritizing speed, throughput, and low latency.
	- source:: Chimera Prime Research
	- maturity:: established
	- owl:class:: bc:Solana
	- belongsToDomain:: [[Blockchain]]

ontology.definition: A high-performance blockchain platform combining Proof-of-History (PoH) with Proof-of-Stake consensus, enabling parallel transaction processing for exceptional throughput exceeding 65,000 TPS. Uses single-layer architecture where all transactions process on the base layer, prioritizing speed, throughput, and low latency.
